title: Best Fitness Semi Recumbent AB Crunch Bench (BFAB20R), Lower & Upper Abdominal Muscles Workout Machine For Home Gym, Red/Black
description: Product DescriptionPerform a variety of ab exercises easily, effectively, and safely with the Body-Solid Best Fitness Semi Recumbent AB Bench (BFAB20). The adjustable, ergonomic AB crunch bench seat can be adjusted into 3 different positions to accommodate a wide range of heights and motion. The AB workout bench seat is angled at 45-degrees and reclines to 2 different 5-degree angles for a wide range of motion. This abdominal bench with adjustable length, textured grip handles, standard weight post, and 2-position footrests make it is comfortable and easy to perform exercises such as ab crunches and knee raises. When assembled the Body-Solid Best Fitness Semi Recumbent AB Bench (BFAB20) measures 64 by 11 by 46 inches (L x W x H). The frame is backed by the Best Fitness 3-year Warranty and the parts are backed by a 1 year warranty.Amazon.comMake any time crunch time with the Best Fitness BFAB20 semi-recumbent ab crunch. Unlike some other ab machines--which require the agility of an acrobat to be thoroughly effective--the BFAB20 puts you in a comfortable seated position without sacrificing your workout efficiency. The ergonomically designed machine is built to help you tighten up your midsection, strengthen your back, and improve your core stability, with your choice of toning your lower abs with knees raises or your upper abs with abdominal crunches. To perform ab crunches, simply use the upholstered upper back support, textured grip handles, and standard weight post. Performing knee raises is just as easy thanks to the adjustable-length, two-position footrests. Add in a three-position upholstered seat--which starts at 45 degrees but offers two additional 5-degree reclining positions--and you have everything you need to design an effective ab regimen in the comfort of your own home.  The BFAB20 is an essential workout accessory because your core is where all your body movements originate. Your abdominal muscles support and protect your internal organs and aid in breathing, especially when you exhale. The abs also team up with your back muscles to control trunk motions, such as twisting and bending. The BFAB20 takes the next step by also strengthening and toning the front of the thighs and increasing hip flexibility. The end results include a flatter stomach, better defined abs, well-developed obliques, a more upright posture, and greater support for your spine. Other features include a 1.75-inch upholstered seat, a durable powder-coated finish, and safety pins and bolts that allow for easy disassembly or permanent setup. The BFAB20 measures 22 by 46 by 64 inches (W x H x D) and carries a three-year warranty.
features: "INDUSTRY LEADER: For 30+ years, Best FItness by Body Solid has held the widest array of products designed to meet the demands of the ever-changing fitness industry (home gym, free weight machines, treadmills, bikes, ellipticals, weight plates, kettlebells, dumbbells, flooring, accessories and more). Our products are cutting edge and reliable and are built for Life……Your Life."

"ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED: This ergonomically designed machine is built to help you tighten up your midsection, strengthen your back and improve your core stability. Its dual functionality lets you target your lower abs with knee raises and your upper abs with abdominal crunches."

"45-DEGREE WORKOUT SEAT: This machine can provide total ab workout from a comfortable seated position. The 45-degree seat angle puts you in position to isolate your abdominal muscles, for a more efficient workout. Plus, with two additional 5-degree reclining positions, you'll be ideally supported for an entire range of core exercises."

"ADJUSTABLE FOOT RESTS: The adjustable foot rests can be adjusted up to 13 different positions including 3 height adjustments and 10 slope level adjustments providing maximum comfort, stability and most importantly, target the right muscle groups for desired results. Plus, with the ergonomic handlebars and padded cushion, you'll be able to get the most out of your session without sacrificing on comfort."

"DIMENSIONS: This ab machine is perfect for those just starting out their core-training journey or for more experienced athletes, as the adjustable tension knob can be easily adjusted to match your preferred challenge level. The measures 22 x 46 x 64 inches and carries a three-year warrantty on the frame and 1 year on ALL parts."

title: Body-Solid Powerline Cable Crossover Machine - High and Low Pulleys Gym Equipment for Home, Functional Trainer, Total Body Exercise, Cable Fly and Crossover Workouts
description: Product DescriptionAchieve total body conditioning with the free motion Powerline by Body-Solid Cable Crossover Machine. An extra-wide and tall mainframe offers easy access to a virtually endless array of high and low pulley exercises, letting you exercise almost every major muscle group in your body. The fully functional professional carriage system utilizes four high resin pulleys on each side with patented nylon bushing technology and eight sealed ball bearings for smooth, continuous movement during your cable workout. The top and bottom pulleys swivel smoothly with more than 180-degrees of motion for frictionless training in all directions. This cable cross machine accepts both Olympic and standard plates (each sold separately) and comes with two cable handles and one ankle strap. When assembled, the Powerline Cable Crossover Machine measures 112 by 39 by 82 inches (L x W x H) and weighs 133 pounds. It is backed by the Powerline 10-Year In-Home , which covers the frame for 10 years and all other parts for one year. Add the Lat Pull-Up/Chin-Up Station (GCA2) to add even more versatility (sold separately).Amazon.comThe Cable Crossover Machine from Powerline offers smooth and friction-free 180-degree motion that allows you to exercise virtually every major muscle group in your body. The system features a wide and tall mainframe with a sturdy build, that provides access to a variety of high and low pulley exercises. The professional carriage system utilizes patented nylon bushing technology and eight sealed ball bearing with large-diameter high resin pulleys to guarantee smooth operation. The top and bottom pulleys swivel with over 180 degrees of movement for frictionless guidance in all directions. The system includes the mainframe as well as two cable handles and one ankle strap. Chin-up handles, standard and Olympic weight plates, and collars can be used with this system but are sold separately.Features and Specifications:Professional carriage system Professional carriage system Patented nylon bushing technology Patented nylon bushing technology Eight sealed ball bearing Eight sealed ball bearing High resin pulleys High resin pulleys Top and bottom pulleys offer over 180 degrees of movement Top and bottom pulleys offer over 180 degrees of movement Accepts both Olympic and standard plates Accepts both Olympic and standard plates Chin-up handles, weight plates, and collars optional (sold separately) Chin-up handles, weight plates, and collars optional (sold separately) Assembled dimensions: 82 by 112 by 39 inches (H x L x W) Assembled dimensions: 82 by 112 by 39 inches (H x L x W)

Rubber end caps on each foot of the Row Machine provide additional stability to the frame and prevent damage to your home gym floor.

INDEPENDENT ARMS: Each arm on this seated row back pull machine works independently of each other. This gives you the option to work both sides of your back at the same time or in an alternating manner. Either way, this allows you to focus on each side of your back (without one side doing the bulk of the work), so you can strengthen each side of your back muscles including the lat muscles and spinal erectors, as well as your biceps as a secondary target

ADJUSTABLE: The seat pad adjusts in 4 positions vertically to find the right height for you during your workout, while the chest pad adjusts in 5 different positions. The seat is tapered for a comfortable and natural position during your row workout.

title: Marcy Standard Weight Bench Incline with Leg Developer and Butterfly Arms, Multifunctional Workout Equipment, Workout Equipment for Home Gym, Alloy Steel MD-389
description: Product DescriptionTake your fitness game to the next level and achieve a more muscular and toned physique with the Diamond Elite Standard Weight Bench from Marcy! This complete gym system lets you train without having to leave the comforts of your home or pay club membership fees! This bench press rack is made of a heavy-duty square steel tube frame and high-density vinyl foam. The powder-coated finished steelwork effectively resists damage from intense use, guaranteeing you an investment that is built to last! It’s off-the-floor base frame provides increased stability when you perform exercises and incorporates the functionality of various machines into one compact design, saving space in your home gym. This gym bench is equipped with dual functioning press arms that are great for executing upper-body exercises such as chest and pec fly pressing. For dedicated bicep workouts using dumbbells or weights, the free-weight rack allows you to store standard weight bars and weight plates and efficiently perform strength training without having to switch to different workout stations. You won’t have any excuse for missing out on leg day or adding muscle to your lower body, as this equipment also showcases a leg station. Work out your hamstrings, quadriceps, and glutes with the leg developer that includes a pivot point that aligns knee joints in the proper position, helping you avoid incorrect body form that can lead to injury. It also ensures adequate muscle isolation so that you can effectively target the development of specific muscle groups. Train like never before and rack up a healthier and fitter body with the Marcy MD-389 Standard Workout Weight Bench!Amazon.comThe MD 389 by Impex Fitness is a compact, versatile, and sturdy bench system that allows you to tone and strengthen all of your major muscle groups. The bench's four-position backpad allows you to perform multi-position bench presses, while the adjustable preacher curl bicep pad works your upper arms, and the dual function leg developer allows you to develop your leg muscles. The MD389 even includes independent arms to isolate your pectorals. Thanks to sturdy steel construction, high-quality, foam-padded upholstery, and a powder coated finish, the bench will provide years of quality training. The bench comes with detailed instructions for easy assembly and carries a two year limited warranty.Features:Adjustable preacher curl bicep pad Adjustable preacher curl bicep pad Dual function leg developer with pivot point that aligns with knee joints Dual function leg developer with pivot point that aligns with knee joints Adjustable four position back pad Adjustable four position back pad Comfortable foam roller pads Comfortable foam roller pads Independent pec-fly arms Independent pec-fly arms Accepts standard size barbell and weight plates Specifications:Frame: 1 by 2-inch steel tubing and 2 by 2-inch 14-gauge square tubing Upholstery: rolled construction with high density foam and accentuated vinyl Durable powder coat finish Assembled Dimensions: 60 by 52 by 47 inches Two-year limited parts warranty Accepts standard size barbell and weight plates Specifications:Frame: 1 by 2-inch steel tubing and 2 by 2-inch 14-gauge square tubing Frame: 1 by 2-inch steel tubing and 2 by 2-inch 14-gauge square tubing Upholstery: rolled construction with high density foam and accentuated vinyl Upholstery: rolled construction with high density foam and accentuated vinyl Durable powder coat finish Durable powder coat finish Assembled Dimensions: 60 by 52 by 47 inches Assembled Dimensions: 60 by 52 by 47 inches Two-year limited parts warranty Two-year limited parts warranty
